articles.content: MINNEAPOLIS -- After a night in which James Harden and the Philadelphia 76ers couldn't have played better together, beating the Minnesota Timberwolves133-102 in his debut with his new team, the super… [+6002 chars]

articles.title: Leander guilty of abuse, says court, orders relief for Rhea - Times of India
articles.description: India News: MUMBAI: A metropolitan magistrate's court has held that tennis player Leander Paes committed various acts of domestic violence against ex-partner mode.

articles.title: Mendis, Dickwella and Thirimanne return to Sri Lanka Test squad - ESPNcricinfo
